page.title: 02MANOR FARM MARSH FARM
page.content:
{MANOR FARM}IS 2 KM FROM CHIPPENHAM AND IS OWNED BY{MR SHILES .}HE IS AN ARABLE FARMER BUT HE HAS GOT 138 ANIMALS . THESE ARE THE CROPS HE GROWS WHEAT , BARLEY AND OIL SEED RAPE . HE HAS GOT{300}ACRES . THE FARM WAS SOLD BY THE GRITTLETON ESTATE IN{1840}AND THE PRESENT OWNERS FATHER BOUGHT IT IN {1888}. HE WORKS 12-14 HOURS A DAY , AND HE HAS BEEN A FARMER FOR{50}YEARS . THE FARM GOT ITS NAME WHEN{ALLINGTON {MANOR}WAS{CONVERTED}INTO A{BARN.
{MARSH FARM {MARSH FARM}IS 2.5 KMS AWAY FROM CHIPPENHAM . THE OWNERS ARE CALLED {MR AND MRS HALL}. THEY ARE{POULTRY {FARMERS . MR AND MRS HALL}HAVE GOT 500 CHICKENS AND 120 DUCKS . THE FARM GOT ITS NAME BECAUSE THE GROUND ON WHICH IT STANDS WAS VERY{MARSHY . {
